body:
Does a log exist somewhere? Everything that gets printed to the terminal seems pleasant enough:

[NbConvertApp] Config changed:
[NbConvertApp] {'NbConvertApp': {'log_level': 10, 'export_format': 'pdf'}, 'TemplateExporter': {'template_file': 'bibliography'}}
[NbConvertApp] IPYTHONDIR set to: /home/haldane/.ipython
[NbConvertApp] Using existing profile dir: '/home/haldane/.ipython/profile_default'
[NbConvertApp] Searching path ['/home/haldane/programming/IPython_Notebook', '/home/haldane/.ipython/profile_default', '/usr/local/etc/ipython', '/etc/ipython'] for config files
[NbConvertApp] Attempting to load config file: ipython_config.py
[NbConvertApp] Attempting to load config file: ipython_nbconvert_config.py
[NbConvertApp] Converting notebook bibliography.ipynb to pdf
[NbConvertApp] Notebook name is 'bibliography'
[NbConvertApp] Applying preprocessor: coalesce_streams
[NbConvertApp] Applying preprocessor: SVG2PDFPreprocessor
[NbConvertApp] Applying preprocessor: ExtractOutputPreprocessor
[NbConvertApp] Applying preprocessor: LatexPreprocessor
[NbConvertApp] Applying preprocessor: HighlightMagicsPreprocessor
[NbConvertApp] Attempting to load template bibliography.tplx
[NbConvertApp] Loaded template bibliography.tplx
[NbConvertApp] Writing 11865 bytes to notebook.tex
[NbConvertApp] Building PDF
[NbConvertApp] Running pdflatex 3 times: ['pdflatex', 'notebook.tex']
[NbConvertApp] PDF successfully created
[NbConvertApp] Writing 45063 bytes to bibliography.pdf
There isn't a separate log file created, but you can see lower level information with a `--debug` flag.
